title: Just got banned on my main
body:
Real bummer, especially since the system protects those that feed and ruin others games and punishes those that have the nerve to speak out. I would take 4 absive players on my team than a single feeder.

Now to go onto my 3 smurfs and just RUIN everyone's games forever. Urgot mid main time and I will just keep making smurfs and scaring off any new players with extremely toxic behaviour. It's not that hard to make a new email.

replies.body:
\>has feeders
\>shit talks them
\>gets banned
\>complains about being banned and feeders
\>decides to be become a feeder themselves
you deserved to be banned tbh

I agree with this, keep doing this and tell all your friends to do this as well!

If the game gets screwed up enough RIOT will do something about the broken automated punishment system!

When Riot loses $$$$
There is a limit on being abusive; How about playing a newgame instead?. Your not making a living off of LOL.
Keep that up and you're gonna get the tyler1 treatment hehe XD
